name: CGMutableImageMetadata
desc: An opaque type for adding or modifying image metadata.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataCreateMutable() -> CGMutableImageMetadata
items.desc: Creates an empty, mutable image metdata opaque type.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataCreateMutableCopy(CGImageMetadata) -> CGMutableImageMetadata?
items.desc: Creates a deep, mutable copy of the specified metadata information.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataSetValueWithPath(CGMutableImageMetadata, CGImageMetadataTag?, CFString, CFTypeRef) -> Bool
items.desc: Update the value of an existing metadata tag, or create a new tag using the specified information.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataSetValueMatchingImageProperty(CGMutableImageMetadata, CFString, CFString, CFTypeRef) -> Bool
items.desc: Updates the value of the metadata tag assigned to the specified image property.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataSetTagWithPath(CGMutableImageMetadata, CGImageMetadataTag?, CFString, CGImageMetadataTag) -> Bool
items.desc: Sets the tag at the specified path in the metadata object.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataRemoveTagWithPath(CGMutableImageMetadata, CGImageMetadataTag?, CFString) -> Bool
items.desc: Removes the tag at the specified path from the metadata object.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataRegisterNamespaceForPrefix(CGMutableImageMetadata, CFString, CFString, UnsafeMutablePointer<Unmanaged<CFError>?>?) -> Bool
items.desc: Registers the specified namespace and prefix with the metadata object.
